snippet.title: Attack at EP-CYG-4 for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

???


Game description:

Attack at EP-CYG-4 is an shooter, for 1 or 2 players. In the 1 player mode, the player plays as an attack ship, who has to destroy all the tartillian structures, aswell as subsequent ships.

In the 2 player mode one player takes the control over the ship, while the other player takes control over the gun.


What I think:

An unique, yet kinda weird game with controls you have to get used to.

Anyways, I like it.
